value.name: Salesforce Inc. stock underperforms Monday when compared to competitors despite daily gains

value.name: Cyber Monday deals heat up as U.S. retailers offer deep cuts
value.description: After lackluster spending at U.S. stores on a deals-heavy Black Friday, retailers are pulling out all the stops with steep promotions and discounts on their websites and apps to entice people to buy holiday gifts and other merchandise after the long Thanksgiving weekend.

value.name: US Retailers Aim to Cash in on Cyber Monday With Steep Online Discounts
value.description: Retailers have been coaxing cautious U.S. shoppers on Cyber Monday with push notifications, emails and other ads touting heavily discounted cosmetics, electronics, toys, clothing and other products. Many including Walmart and Amazon use AI-enabled chatbots on their websites and apps to help customers with queries and drive them to hit '"buy."

value.name: OpenAI looks to add advertising to AI products, CFO tells FT
value.description: Microsoft ( NASDAQ: MSFT )-backed generative AI company OpenAI is discussing plans to introduce advertising to its range of products, as the ChatGPT maker seeks new revenue sources, chief financial officer Sarah Friar told the Financial Times.

value.name: Salesforce Gears Up For Q3 Print; Here Are The Recent Forecast Changes From Wall Street's Most Accurate Analysts
value.description: Analysts expect Salesforce to report quarterly earnings at $2.45 per share. That's up from $2.11 per share a year ago. The San Francisco, California-based company projects to report quarterly revenue of $9.35 billion, compared to $8.72 billion a year earlier, according to data from Benzinga Pro.

value.name: Black Friday Online Sales Approach $11 Billion Up 10%, As In-Store Traffic Falls 8%
value.description: Online brands saw big growth on Black Friday, but it came at the expense of in-store shopping. The extended promotional period also hurt Black Friday.

value.name: Why Salesforce Inc (CRM) Is One of the Best Stocks to Buy For Long Term Growth?

value.name: Shoppers Spent Over $6 Billion Online On Thanksgiving, As Cyber Week Begins
value.description: Online spending rose significantly on Thanksgiving Day, with more people than ever shopping on their mobile devices.

value.name: More retailers report this week, amid signs of solid online holiday spending
value.description: As a shorter holiday-shopping home stretch this year kicks into gear, more retailers - including Foot Locker Inc. and Victoria's Secret & Co. - report this week, likely offering more detail about consumer spending appetites as analysts narrow their focus on individual successes and failures from chain to chain.

value.name: Black Friday goes digital as American rack up $10bn worth of online purchases
value.description: Americans spent a staggering $10bn online shopping on Black Friday while in-store purchases continued to dip, according to analysts. This year, consumers took advantage of deals from Amazon and Walmart to purchase desktops, laptops and phones, while sales at Best Buy and Target were stagnant.

value.name: Three Stocks: SoundHound, Chipotle Mexican Grill and Salesforce.com
value.description: Adding further momentum to SoundHound’s stock was the news from NVIDIA’s ( NVDA) recent 13F filing, which confirmed that the prominent AI chip maker continues to hold a stake in SoundHound. The disclosure on November 14 has reassured investors of NVIDIA’s ongoing commitment and belief in SoundHound’s potential, enhancing the stock's appeal.

value.name: Meta hires Salesforce's CEO of AI, Clara Shih, to lead new business AI group
value.description: Meta hired Salesforce's CEO of AI, Clara Shih, to lead a new organization building AI tools for businesses that use Meta's apps to reach consumers, according to a LinkedIn post from Shih on Tuesday.
